spec_data.Name: perl-UDDI-Lite
spec_data.Description:
UDDI::Lite for Perl is a collection of Perl modules which provides a simple
and lightweight interface to the Universal Description, Discovery and
Integration (UDDI) server.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:59:31 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Library for UDDI clients in Perl
